verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto the LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> he is good: <WH2896> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the God <WH430> of gods: <WH430> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
O give thanks <WH3034> to the Lord <WH113> of lords: <WH113> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him who alone <WH905> doeth <WH6213> great <WH1419> wonders: <WH6381> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him that by wisdom <WH8394> made <WH6213> the heavens: <WH8064> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him that stretched out <WH7554> the earth <WH776> above <WH5921> the waters: <WH4325> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him that made <WH6213> great <WH1419> lights: <WH216> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
<WH853> The sun <WH8121> to rule <WH4475> by day: <WH3117> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
<WH853> The moon <WH3394> and stars <WH3556> to rule <WH4475> by night: <WH3915> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him that smote <WH5221> Egypt <WH4714> in their firstborn: <WH1060> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
And brought out <WH3318> Israel <WH3478> from among <WH4480> <WH8432> them: for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
With a strong <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and with a stretched out <WH5186> arm: <WH2220> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him which divided <WH1504> the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> into parts: <WH1506> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
And made Israel <WH3478> to pass through <WH5674> the midst <WH8432> of it: for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
But overthrew <WH5286> Pharaoh <WH6547> and his host <WH2428> in the Red <WH5488> sea: <WH3220> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him which led <WH1980> his people <WH5971> through the wilderness: <WH4057> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
To him which smote <WH5221> great <WH1419> kings: <WH4428> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
And slew <WH2026> famous <WH117> kings: <WH4428> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites: <WH567> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
And Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan: <WH1316> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
And gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> for a heritage: <WH5159> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
Even a heritage <WH5159> unto Israel <WH3478> his servant: <WH5650> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
Who remembered <WH2142> us in our low estate: <WH7945> <WH8216> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769>
And hath redeemed <WH6561> us from our enemies: <WH4480> <WH6862> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
Who giveth <WH5414> food <WH3899> to all <WH3605> flesh: <WH1320> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the God <WH410> of heaven: <WH8064> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
